channel.title: Multi-Activity Holidays in Northeast India on Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-Activity Holidays in Northeast India on Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Multi-Activity Holiday in Assam: Tea, Wildlife & Culture
item.description: Multi-Activity Holiday in Assam: The Brahmaputra Valley This multi-activity tour takes us to the Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Multi-activity holiday in Meghalaya: Hike, Bike, Nature & Culture
item.description: Multi-Activity Holiday in Meghalaya: Land of the matriarchs This particular Multi-activity tour takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills of Meghalaya.

item.title: Multi-Activity tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Hike, Bike, Raft & Culture
item.description: Multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Birth of one of the greatest river valleys This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River valley.

item.title: Multi-activity holiday in Western Arunachal Pradesh: Hike, Bike & Culture
item.description: Multi-activity holiday in western Arunachal Pradesh: Active & Interactive in the High Himalayas This multi-activity tour is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the state’s Buddhist belt.
